text: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَهْتَدُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture that perhaps they would be guided.
translation.id.indonesian: Dan sesungguhnya telah Kami berikan Al Kitab (Taurat) kepada Musa, agar mereka (Bani Israil) mendapat petunjuk.
